title: Akiba Takeover!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Ah! Look, look, over here too! And there~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>There are µ’s posters everywhere!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hehe~ Akiba’s been taken over by µ’s, nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I wanna take pictures with the life-sized cutouts~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ah, me too, me too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Let’s pose with some µ’s merchandise!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Nice idea!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I-I’m starting to feel a bit embarrassed...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Aqours and Nijigaku are also doing their own things in their hometowns, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah, that’s right, but exhibitions of the groups we’re cheering for are special~ 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Exactly! I’m going to take pictures of all the posters and banners!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata-chan’s curious about the collab food menu~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>If we visit every collab location, it’ll be a nice workout too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>All of them!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>That’s...a bit much...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I want to go to them all! Hey, can you guide us?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Sure! Follow Rin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Wait, Rin-chan! You’re going the wrong way! We’re supposed to go over there!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eh? Really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Seriously... Remember where the displays are properly. What are you going to do if other people who come to visit ask you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>As expected of Maki-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>You’re really reliable.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>W-well, it’s only natural! Now, let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
